debug.name: Enable debug messages
debug.label: Enables debug messages in the console (F12)

anim-block-update.name: Animations block updates
anim-block-update.label: If checked, damage/heal animations will block updates to the bars until done, including new ones being added. If this is disabled, it might lead to janky animations when bars are added or changed while an animation is playing.

scale.name: Global Scale
scale.label: Scale for the whole boss bars segment of the UI

min-button-role.name: Minimum Bar Permission
min-button-role.label: Minimum permission to have the boss bar button
